name: Jump Tree
description:
Jump Tree is a casual game 3D.

You are a tree, jump over infinite platform and dont fall into the sea.

How far can you go?
Only a few can reach more than 150...

Features:
◉ Unlock new trees!
◉ Get to your highest record and beat your friends!
◉ Have fun while helping our environment. Play and plant trees!

Thanks to our reforestation program you will plant trees directly while you play through the in-app purchases or the rewarded ads. To learn more follow us on:

Website: https: https://greengames.app/
Email: team@greengames.app
